API Reference

This section contains the complete API reference for Time Warp IDE.

Core Modules

class Time_Warp.ArduinoController(simulation_mode=True)[source]

Bases: object

Arduino hardware controller with simulation support

class Time_Warp.AudioMixer[source]

Bases: object

Audio mixer for playing sounds with play/aplay support

play_sound(name)[source]

Play a registered sound

register_sound(name, path)[source]

Register a sound file with a name

class Time_Warp.CodeFoldingSystem(text_widget, line_numbers_widget, ide)[source]

Bases: object

Code folding system for collapsing/expanding code blocks

add_fold_marker(line_num, symbol, is_folded)[source]

Add a fold marker to the line numbers widget

detect_foldable_blocks()[source]

Detect blocks that can be folded

fold_block(start_line, end_line)[source]

Fold a code block

on_line_number_click(event)[source]

Handle click on line numbers for folding

setup_folding()[source]

Setup code folding functionality

toggle_fold(start_line)[source]

Toggle folding of a code block

unfold_block(start_line)[source]

Unfold a code block

update_fold_markers()[source]

Update fold markers in line numbers

class Time_Warp.IntelligentCodeCompletion(text_widget, ide)[source]

Bases: object

Advanced code completion system for Time Warp IDE

get_context_help(command)[source]

Get detailed help for a command

hide_completion(event=None)[source]

Hide the completion window

insert_completion(command)[source]

Insert selected completion into editor

on_key_release(event)[source]

Handle key release events for triggering completion

show_completion(event=None)[source]

Manually trigger completion with Ctrl+Space

show_completion_suggestions()[source]

Show completion suggestions based on current context

show_completion_window(suggestions)[source]

Display the completion popup window

Bases: object

Particle for visual effects

Check BASIC syntax

Check PILOT command syntax

Check syntax of current content and highlight errors

Highlight errors and warnings in the text

Check if value is numeric or a valid variable reference

on_key_release(event=None)[source]

Handle key release events for syntax checking

setup_error_tags()[source]

Setup text tags for error highlighting

class Time_Warp.TimeWarpInterpreter(output_widget=None)[source]

Bases: object

continue_running()[source]

Continue running until breakpoint or end.

create_sprite(name, path)[source]

Create a new sprite

determine_command_type(command)[source]

Determine which language the command belongs to

draw_circle_at(x, y, radius, color, start_angle=0, end_angle=360, aspect=1.0)[source]

Draw a circle or arc at specified coordinates

draw_dot(size)[source]

Draw a dot at the current turtle position

draw_image(path, width=None, height=None)[source]

Draw an image at the current turtle position

draw_rectangle(width, height)[source]

Draw a rectangle with the given width and height

draw_sprite(name)[source]

Draw a sprite at its current position

evaluate_expression(expr)[source]

Safely evaluate mathematical expressions with variables

execute_basic_command(command)[source]

Execute BASIC-like commands

execute_draw_commands(draw_string)[source]

Execute DRAW command string with turtle graphics commands

execute_line(line)[source]

Execute a single line of code

execute_logo_command(command)[source]

Execute Logo-like commands

execute_pilot_command(command)[source]

Execute PILOT commands

execute_program(program_text)[source]

Execute a program - wrapper for run_program

get_user_input(prompt='')[source]

Get input from user

interpolate_text(text: str) → str[source]

Interpolate VAR tokens and evaluate expr tokens inside a text string.

This central helper is used by T: and MT: to keep interpolation logic consistent and reduce duplication.

load_program(program_text)[source]

Load and parse a program

log_output(text)[source]

Log output to widget or console

move_turtle(distance)[source]

Move turtle forward/backward by distance, drawing if pen is down

parse_bracketed_commands(commands_str)[source]

Parse Logo commands from bracketed string, handling nested brackets

parse_line(line)[source]

Parse a program line for line number and command

play_music_string(music_string)[source]

Play music using GW-BASIC PLAY command syntax

play_sound(frequency, duration, volume=255, voice=0)[source]

Play a sound with specified frequency, duration, volume, and voice

reset()[source]

Reset interpreter state

reset_turtle()[source]
run_program(program_text)[source]

Run a complete program

set_debug_mode(enabled)[source]

Enable/disable debug mode

set_sprite_position(name, x, y)[source]

Set sprite position

step()[source]

Execute a single line and pause (for debugger stepping).

stop_program()[source]

Stop program execution

take_snapshot(filename)[source]

Take a snapshot of the graphics canvas

toggle_breakpoint(line_number)[source]

Toggle breakpoint at line

toggle_hud()[source]

Toggle the HUD display

update_hud()[source]

Update the HUD display
